strapiPost.title: The Jones Center To Host Spring Break Activities
strapiPost.content:
There will be no shortage of things to do this Spring Break as The Jones Center is adding to the week of events. 

  • A week of fun: The Jones Center is offering free and low-cost activities, events, and entertainment March 21-25 for all ages. With ice skating, swimming, biking, crafts, movies, and more there will be something for everyone. 
  • Special events: To name a few activities, there will be “dive-in” movies in the aquatic center, inflatables to crawl around and jump on in the gymnasium, and outdoor lawn games to enjoy as well. 

Click HERE for more details on Spring Break at The Jones Center.
